p: The following information was extracted from the EPARs for all products included in our study: active substance, Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification first level, date and type of MA, authorisation status (authorised, suspended, withdrawn), orphan designation (yes/no), aRMMs at the time of MA (yes/no), aRMMs at the time of data extraction (yes/no), and type of aRMMs.
